unnormalised: Hey, anyone know a good neuro Dr. in Bangalore? My uncle, Mr. Sharma, has been having headaches since last week & the local doc just prescribed Paracetamol 500mg which isn't helping. He's also feeling dizzy, like, proper chakkar. Wanna get a second opinion from someone at NIMHANS or Apollo Hospital, maybe? Any recommendations or personal experiences?
normalised: Hey, anyone know a good neuro Doctor in Bangalore? My uncle, Mister Sharma, has been having headaches since last week and the local doctor just prescribed Paracetamol five hundred milligram which isn't helping. He's also feeling dizzy, like, proper chakkar. Wanna get a second opinion from someone at N-I-M-H-A-N-S or Apollo Hospital, maybe? Any recommendations or personal experiences?
